tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_images(
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name TEXT,
    time_taken TIMESTAMP,
    location_name TEXT,
    erosion_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE erosion_impact (
    impact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id),
    erosion_type VARCHAR,
    impact_level FLOAT,
    impact_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE human_activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR,
    activity_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR,
    impact_id UUID REFERENCES erosion_impact(impact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_date DATE,
    image_resolution VARCHAR(50),
    image_source VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE erosion_areas (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(255),
    area_location VARCHAR(100),
    area_size INT,
    erosion_rate DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE coastal_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_impact DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE comparison_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id1 INT,
    image_id2 INT,
    area_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    erosion_change DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_report (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    report_summary TEXT,
    report_conclusion TEXT
)
